summary: Online platform for artists featuring job offerings, gigs, bookings, product store with music library for selling recordings, and Stripe payment integration
architectural_notes: Platform targets artist community with multiple revenue streams
Payment processing via Stripe with card payment support required
Multi-feature marketplace combining jobs, gigs, bookings, and products
Music library feature enables artists to upload and sell audio recordings

existing_features.title: Create artist profile system where artists can register, create profiles with bio, portfolio images, skills, and contact information
Implement job offerings marketplace where employers can post job opportunities for artists with job title, description, budget, and deadline
Create gigs marketplace where artists can list their services (gigs) with title, description, pricing, and delivery time, and clients can browse and purchase gigs
Build booking system where clients can book artist services by selecting date, time, service type, and duration, with availability calendar for artists
Create product store where artists can list physical or digital products (artwork, prints, merchandise) with images, descriptions, and prices, and customers can browse and add items to cart
Integrate Stripe payment processing to handle card payments for gig purchases, bookings, and product store orders

Design a cohesive visual identity with warm, creative aesthetics using earth tones and artistic typography that appeals to artists and creative professionals, applying this style consistently across all pages and components
Display generated hero banner, artist profile placeholder images, and product showcase images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated
Create admin user management interface where admins can view all registered users (artists and clients) with their profiles, registration dates, and activity status
Add admin controls in user management interface to suspend/activate users and assign admin privileges with confirmation dialogs
Create site configuration interface where admins can manage platform settings including site name, contact email, featured content, and marketplace rules
Add navigation link to admin dashboard in Layout header that is visible only to authenticated admin users

Create AdminStoreSettingsPage component at frontend/src/pages/AdminStoreSettingsPage.tsx with authentication and admin permission checks following the same pattern as AdminSiteConfigPage and AdminUserManagementPage

Add UI form in AdminStoreSettingsPage for configuring store settings including product approval workflow toggle, default product visibility options, inventory tracking preferences, featured product limits, and product listing rules
Add route for admin store settings page at /admin/store-settings in App.tsx router configuration
Add 'Store Settings' navigation link to the admin dropdown menu in Layout.tsx header, positioned after 'Site Settings', that navigates to /admin/store-settings
Create React Query hooks in useQueries.ts for fetching and updating store configuration settings, following the established patterns for other configuration queries
Create a bulk image upload interface in the StorePage component that allows users to select and upload multiple images simultaneously
Implement frontend logic to process each uploaded image by calling the backend product creation method sequentially or in parallel batches
Add toast notifications and feedback messages during bulk upload process to inform users of upload progress and completion status
Add validation to ensure uploaded files are valid image formats (JPEG, PNG, GIF, WebP) and within reasonable size limits before processing

Create AdminStripeSettingsPage component at frontend/src/pages/AdminStripeSettingsPage.tsx with authentication and admin permission checks following the same pattern as AdminSiteConfigPage and AdminStoreSettingsPage

Add UI form in AdminStripeSettingsPage for configuring Stripe settings including publishable key, secret key (masked input), webhook secret, webhook endpoint URL, payment currency options, and test mode toggle
Add route for admin Stripe settings page at /admin/stripe-settings in App.tsx router configuration
Add 'Stripe Settings' navigation link to the admin dropdown menu in Layout.tsx header, positioned after 'Store Settings', that navigates to /admin/stripe-settings
Create React Query hooks in useQueries.ts for fetching and updating Stripe configuration settings, following the established patterns for other configuration queries

Expand AdminStoreSettingsPage to include item/product configuration options for pricing rules (minimum price, maximum price, price increment restrictions), product categories list management, product tags system, featured product selection, and product status workflow

Create MusicLibraryPage component at frontend/src/pages/MusicLibraryPage.tsx that displays all available music items in a grid layout with audio preview, title, artist name, price, and 'Add to Cart' button
Add music upload dialog in MusicLibraryPage for authenticated artists to upload songs with fields for audio file selection, title, price, description, and category dropdown
Add route for music library page at /music in App.tsx router configuration
Add 'Music Library' navigation link to Layout.tsx header that navigates to /music, positioned after 'Store'
Create React Query hooks in useQueries.ts for music operations: useGetAllMusic, useGetMusicById, useCreateMusic, useUpdateMusic, and useDeleteMusic following established patterns
Update cart functionality in useCart.ts to support music items with type 'music', tracking musicId, title, artist, and price
Enhance BulkImageUpload component to include input fields for category dropdown, subcategory text input, price number input, and description textarea for each uploaded image
Update bulk image upload logic in StorePage to pass category, subcategory, price, and description metadata from BulkImageUpload component to the backend createProduct method for each image

new_feature_requests.summary: Artist profile and support system
Job offerings and gigs marketplace
Booking system for artist services
Product store for artist merchandise
Stripe payment integration with card support
User management in admin
Site configuration options in admin
Implement backend user management system with methods to list all users, get user details, update user status (active/suspended), and assign admin roles
Implement backend site configuration storage and methods to update and retrieve platform settings including site metadata, marketplace rules, and featured content lists
Create store item settings/configuration interface in admin
Create backend methods in main.mo to manage store-level configuration including default product settings, inventory management rules, shipping options, tax settings, and product approval workflow
Add bulk image upload feature where each uploaded image automatically creates a new product item
Add backend method to create a product automatically from an uploaded image with default values for title, description, and price
Add Stripe configuration settings in admin (API keys, webhook settings, payment options)
Expand item/product configuration options in admin (pricing rules, categories, tags, etc.)

Create backend storage and methods in main.mo to manage Stripe configuration including publishable key, secret key, webhook secret, webhook endpoint, currency, and test mode flag with get and update operations

Update backend StoreConfig type in main.mo to include fields for pricing rules (minPrice, maxPrice), product categories array, product tags array, featured product settings, and product status workflow options
Create music library where artists can upload songs/recordings and sell copies to customers
Enhance bulk image upload to include category/subcategory, price, and description fields when creating products
Create a Music data type in backend/main.mo with fields for title (Text), artist (Principal), audioFileBlob (Blob), price (Nat), description (Text), category (Text), uploadDate (Int), and unique ID

Add backend methods in main.mo for music management: createMusic (accepts audio blob, title, price, description, category), getAllMusic (returns all music items), getMusicById (returns single music item), updateMusic (modifies existing music), and deleteMusic (removes music item)
Add subcategory field (Text) to Product data type in backend/main.mo to store product subcategory classification
